data.label: Ping++ SDK
data.description: Ping++ 是一种全新的移动支付接入方式。通过使用 Ping++ 提供的 SDK，你的产品可以同时支持目前主流的多种支付渠道。同时 Ping++ 还提供交易管理平台，方便你统一管理所有支付渠道中的交易，有效降低你的前期开发和后期管理成本。

data.label: Ping++ SDK
data.description: Ping++ is a new mobile payment integration method. By using the SDK provided by Ping++, your product can simultaneously support various mainstream payment channels. Ping++ also provides a transaction management platform, allowing you to manage transactions across all payment channels effectively, reducing your upfront development and subsequent management costs.
